Uses of Class
java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap.Segment

  • Packages that use ConcurrentHashMap.Segment 
    Package Description
    java.util.concurrent
    Utility classes commonly useful in concurrent programming.

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) ConcurrentHashMap.Segment<K,V>[] ConcurrentHashMap.segments
      The segments, each of which is a specialized hash table.
      Methods in java.util.concurrent that return ConcurrentHashMap.Segment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private ConcurrentHashMap.Segment<K,V> ConcurrentHashMap.ensureSegment(int k)
      Returns the segment for the given index, creating it and recording in segment table (via CAS) if not already present.
      (package private) static <K,V> ConcurrentHashMap.Segment<K,V> ConcurrentHashMap.segmentAt(ConcurrentHashMap.Segment<K,V>[] ss, int j)
      Gets the jth element of given segment array (if nonnull) with volatile element access semantics via Unsafe.
      private ConcurrentHashMap.Segment<K,V> ConcurrentHashMap.segmentForHash(int h)
      Get the segment for the given hash

      Gets the jth element of given segment array (if nonnull) with volatile element access semantics via Unsafe.
